data.meta_site_name: Robert Lowry Obituary | November 28, 2019 | Myers Mortuary - Layton, UT
data.text:
Robert “Bob” James Lowry, son of Claud and Annie Lowry, born on November 18, 1940, followed the light into heaven on November 28, 2019. Bob was a loving husband, devoted dad, sweet grandpa, dear great grandpa, adoring brother, kind uncle and special friend to everyone, showing kindness and respect for all who crossed his path. He enjoyed life, good food, the outdoors and always with an added dose of humor to the very end. Bob will truly be missed and will forever be remembered for the many beautiful memories locked safe in our hearts. Laid to rest at Syracuse City Cemetery.

To send flowers to the family or plant a tree in memory of Robert James Lowry, please visit our floral store.
